text: vahee vah khuda hai jisane tumako pahale (pahal) mitatee se paida kiya phir nutphe se, phir jame hue khoon phir tumako bachcha banaakar (maan ke pet) se nikalata hai (taaki badhon) phir (zinda rakhata hai) taaki tum apanee javaanee ko pahuncho phir (aur zinda rakhata hai taaki tum boodhe ho jao aur tumamen se koee aisa bhee hai jo (isase) pahale mar jaata hai garaz (tumako us vakt tak zinda rakhata hai) kee tum (maut ke) mukarrar vakt tak pahunch jao
